mapper.sql: ID, S_PRODUCT_NAME, S_MIDDLE_NAME, S_PROCESS_NAME, N_OPERATION_STEPS, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME, S_PARA_NAME, S_TABLE_NAME
mapper.select: select distinct "S_MIDDLE_NAME" from KANION.KY_MID_INDEX where S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}
select distinct "S_PARA_NAME" from KANION.KY_MID_INDEX where S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName} and S_MIDDLE_NAME = #{midName}
select distinct "S_TABLE_NAME" from KANION.KY_MID_INDEX where S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName} and S_MIDDLE_NAME = #{midName}
mapper.insert: insert into KY_MID_INDEX (ID, S_PRODUCT_NAME, S_MIDDLE_NAME, S_PROCESS_NAME, N_OPERATION_STEPS, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME, S_PARA_NAME, S_TABLE_NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sMiddleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sParaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into KY_MID_INDEX
ID,
S_PRODUCT_NAME,
S_MIDDLE_NAME,
S_PROCESS_NAME,
N_OPERATION_STEPS,
S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME,
S_PARA_NAME,
S_TABLE_NAME,

mapper.update:
update KY_MID_INDEX
S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_MIDDLE_NAME = #{sMiddleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_PARA_NAME = #{sParaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_TABLE_NAME = #{sTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update KY_MID_INDEX set S_PRODUCT_NAME = #{sProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_MIDDLE_NAME = #{sMiddleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PROCESS_NAME = #{sProcessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, N_OPERATION_STEPS = #{nOperationSteps,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, S_OPERATION_STEPS_NAME = #{sOperationStepsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_PARA_NAME = #{sParaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_TABLE_NAME = #{sTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
